ident.body:
The identification has been completed successfully and your data will now be checked.
The verification can take up to 24 hours in some cases.

Your DFX Team
Bitcoiners by heart ♥

failed.body:
We have noticed that your online identification has failed. However, we have already unlocked video identification for you.
Please continue by clicking on the refresh button in the limit section on the payment page (access via the "My DFX" button in the app) or here.

Take the final step and start working on your financial freedom today

Your DFX Team
Bitcoiners by heart ♥
failed.title: Online identification failed

success.body:
Your verification is complete.
Happy Trading
Your DFX Team
Bitcoiners by heart ♥️
success.title: Verification successful

return.salutation: DFX staking service end date is Dec. 31,  2022 - new deposits will be reimbursed

We reimbursed your last DFX staking deposit to your wallet address
New staking deposits are no longer possible.

Wallet address***{userAddressTrimmed}

If you have any questions, we are happy to help you at support@dfx.swiss.
Thank you very much for your trust
Your DFX Team
Bitcoiners by heart ♥️
return.title: We reimbursed your new DFX staking deposit

dailyLimit.salutation: You have exceeded your 24h volume limit
dailyLimit.body:
Please verify yourself by KYC (know your customer) to increase your limit.
After a successful KYC we proceed with your transaction.
Increase the limit by KYC?
Click here to start the KYC process.
Alternatively, you can also use the DFX app on your payment page,
click on the red arrow next to "Your limit"
and start the verification.
If you have any questions, we are happy to help you at support@dfx.swiss.
Thank you very much for your trust
Your DFX Team
Bitcoiners by heart ♥️
dailyLimit.title: 24h limit exceeded

annualLimit.salutation: You have exceeded your yearly volume limit
annualLimit.body:
Please apply for a new annual limit.
Once the new limit has been approved,
we proceed with your transaction.
Increase the limit?
Open the payment page via "My DFX" in the DFX App.
Go to the red arrow under "Your limit" and
request a new desired limit.
If you have any questions, we are happy to help you at support@dfx.swiss.
Thank you very much for your trust
Your DFX Team
Bitcoiners by heart ♥️
annualLimit.title: Annual limit exceeded

annualLimitWithoutKyc.salutation: You have exceeded your yearly volume limit without KYC
annualLimitWithoutKyc.body:
Dear valued customer, many thanks for your trust in DFX AG.
Unfortunately, we cannot process without a full verification as you exceed your annual limit.
We therefore ask you to use this link here to perform KYC with your ID card.
Alternatively, you can also use the DFX app on your payment page
to click on the red arrow next to "Your limit"
and start KYC
If you do not want to carry out the verification, the money will be returned fully automatically after 7 days.
If you have any questions, we are happy to help you at support@dfx.swiss.
Thank you very much for your trust
Your DFX Team
Bitcoiners by heart ♥️
annualLimitWithoutKyc.title: Pending transaction - annual limit exceeded without KYC

olkyNoKyc.salutation: Verification by KYC is required to use our bank in Luxembourg
olkyNoKyc.body:
In order to use our bank account in Luxembourg with the SEPA Instant function, full verification is unfortunately mandatory.
We therefore ask you to use this link here to perform KYC with your ID card
Alternatively, you can also use the DFX app on your payment page
to click on the red arrow next to "Your limit"
and start KYC
Without verification, you can continue to use our bank account from Switzerland up to EUR 1,000 per day without KYC via standard Sepa.
If you do not want to carry out the verification, the money will be returned fully automatically after 7 days.
If you have any questions, we are happy to help you at support@dfx.swiss.
Thank you very much for your trust
Your DFX Team
Bitcoiners by heart ♥️
olkyNoKyc.title: KYC required to use SEPA instant wire transfers

nameCheckWithoutKyc.salutation: Your pending transaction needs a full KYC verification before execution
nameCheckWithoutKyc.body:
Dear valued customer, many thanks for your trust in DFX AG.
Unfortunately, we cannot process your order without a full verification (KYC)
We therefore ask you to use this link here to perform KYC with your ID card
Alternatively, you can also use the DFX app on your payment page
to click on the red arrow next to "Your limit"
and start KYC
If you do not want to carry out the verification, the money will be returned fully automatically after 7 days.
If you have any questions, we are happy to help you at support@dfx.swiss.
Thank you very much for your trust
Your DFX Team
Bitcoiners by heart ♥️
nameCheckWithoutKyc.title: KYC required to execute your pending transaction

manualApproved.salutation: Your transaction volume has been approved
manualApproved.body:
Hi {firstname},

Your request of {limitAmount} EUR transaction volume has been approved and is now freely available to you

Thank you for your trust in DFX.

Please do not hesitate to contact me if you have any questions.

Kind regards,
{mailName}

Assistance CEO
manualApproved.title: Transaction volume approved

invitation.body:
Hi {firstname},

first of all I would like to introduce myself. My name is Oli and I am CMO at DFX.swiss.

For some time now, we have been maintaining a Telegram group for people with larger investments via DFX.swiss and would like to offer you with this group

- provide a direct mouthpiece to the C-Level of DFX
- provide a platform for discussions
- listen closely to your requests for new services
- and introduce you to new topics and services in advance

We would be pleased if you would like to join this group.

We have provided you with direct access to this group on your personal DFX Payment page. Just click on MyDFX in the DFX app and follow the link.

Thank you for your trust in us.
Oli
invitation.title: Invitation Black Squad
